name.baseName: raw meal preparation;raw meal, portland cement raw meal;new dry process, ≥4000 t/d
生料制备;生料, 硅酸盐水泥生料;新型干法, ≥4000 t/d

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: New dry process for cement raw meal production.
新型干法制备水泥生料。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set pertains to the raw meal preparation process, specifically for the production of portland cement using the new dry process with a capacity of equal to or greater than 4000 tons/day. The described process is crucial in the production of cement clinker, a key intermediate in the manufacture of portland cement. This industrial process is generally applicable in large-scale cement production facilities.
此数据集涉及生料制备过程，具体为使用新型干法生产硅酸盐水泥生料，产能在每天等于或超过4000吨。描述的过程对于生产硅酸盐水泥熟料至关重要，是生产硅酸盐水泥的关键中间环节。这一工业过程通常适用于大规模水泥生产设施。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The LCA system boundary is the raw meal preparation unit process.
LCA 系统边界为生料制备单元过程。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: A cement clinker lifecycle model was developed using eFootprint software system from Integrated Knowledge for our Environment, combined with CLCD quality assessment method, and LCA results were calculated.
采用亿科环境 eFootprint 软件系统，结合 CLCD 质量评估方法建立了水泥生料生命周期模型，并计算得到 LCA 结果。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of each raw material involved in the raw meal preparation stage is provided by the background database.
生料制备阶段涉及的各原材料的清单数据均由背景数据库提供。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 李畅. (2020). 江西省某铜尾矿资源化过程生命周期评价研究 [硕士, 江西理工大学].
李畅. (2020). 江西省某铜尾矿资源化过程生命周期评价研究 [硕士, 江西理工大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of cement raw meal preparation, please note that the dataset is based on the cut-off criteria as recommended by the ISO140 series of international standards. Users should include all major raw materials that constitute more than 1% of the total raw material weight and any high-purity substances that constitute more than 0.1% of the total weight in their LCA model. Ignored materials' total mass should not exceed 5% of total raw material input. Any environmental emissions data with negligible contributions to LCA results may be omitted. Consideration should also be given to excluding upstream data for low-value waste materials used as raw materials from the LCA model, such as tailings.
在使用此数据集进行水泥生料制备生命周期评估（LCA）时，请注意，数据集基于国际标准ISO140系列推荐的剪切标准。用户应在其LCA模型中包含构成总原材料重量超过1%的所有主要原材料和构成总重量超过0.1%的任何高纯度物质。忽略的材料总质量不应超过总原料投入量的5%。任何对LCA结果贡献微不足道的环境排放数据可能被省略。还应考虑从LCA模型中排除用作原材料的低价值废料的上游数据，如尾矿。

completeness.common:other: The data selection principle in this study adopts the cut-off principle recommended in the ISO140 series of international standards. The principle is based on the ratio of raw and auxiliary material input to product quality in the production process. The specific cut-off principle is as follows: (1) When the input weight of each ordinary raw material is less than 1% of the total input weight of process raw materials, and the weight of the raw material containing high-purity substances is less than 0.1% of the total input weight of process raw materials, the upstream production data of the material can be ignored. Additionally, the total mass of the ordinary material ignored should not exceed 5% of the total weight of the raw material input. In the case of system environmental emission data, the value of its contribution to the relevant LCA results can be calculated before deciding whether to ignore this data; (2) Upstream production data of low-value waste materials generated from other production processes as raw materials, such as tailings, can be ignored.

数据取舍原则采用ISO140系列国际标准中建议的 cut-off 原则。即以生产过程中各项原辅材料投入与产品质量的比为数据取舍依据。具体取舍原则如下：①当各项普通原料投入重量小于 1% 过程原料投入总重量，以及原料中含有高纯度物质的重量小于 0.1% 过程原料投入总重量时，可忽略该物料的上游生产数据，总共忽略的普通物料质量不超过 5%原料投入总重量。如果是系统环境排放数据，则可以先计算其对相关 LCA 结果的贡献值，然后决定该数据是否忽略； ②其他生产过程产生的低价值废料作原料，如尾矿等，可忽略其上游生产数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Iron powder. Upstream data source: CLCD-China-ECER 0.8.1.
Total particulate matter [emitted to atmosphere], with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter.
总颗粒物[排放到大气]，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
